front.title: PPP Tunneling Using Layer Two Tunneling Protocol Version 3 (L2TPv3)

abstract.t: This document describes the use of "version 3" of Layer Two TunnelingProtocol (L2TPv3) to tunnel Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP) packets.This document defines the control protocol and encapsulationspecifics for tunneling PPP over L2TPv3, and is a companion documentto the L2TPv3 base specification.
